TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MasterPage extends System.Web.UI.UserControl

summary.span: 充当仅由 控件和它们各自的子控件组成的页面的模板和合并容器。

span.span: Acts as a template and merging container for pages that are composed only of controls and their respective child controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 作为一个模板容器和合并网页的 ASP.NET Web 应用程序中的内容页面的母版页函数。A master page functions as a template container and merging page for content pages in your ASP.NET Web application. 主页面提供内容页面的一组共享结构和内容的简便方法。Master pages provide a convenient way to share structure and content across a set of content pages. 内容占位符用于定义将替换为从内容页的内容的母版页的部分。You use content placeholders to define the sections of the master page to replace with content from the content pages. 当您使用母版页和其相关的内容页时，添加所需的 XHTML 文档标记 (如`html`， `head`，和`body`) 仅对母版页并且不再作为独立的 Web 创建其他.aspx 文件 （ASP.NET 页）页。When you use a master page and its related content pages, you add the required XHTML document tags (such as `html`, `head`, and `body`) only to the master page and no longer create your other .aspx files (ASP.NET pages) as stand-alone Web pages. 内容页面定义的内容要插入到母版页中的占位符。The content pages define the content to insert into the placeholders in the master page. 当页面在运行时发出 HTTP 请求时，母版页和内容页合并到单个类与内容页相同的名称。When an HTTP request is made for a page at run time, the master page and content pages are combined into a single class with the same name as the content pages. 编译生成，合并的类派生自类。The resulting compiled, merged class derives from the class. 主页面可以包含直接标记和服务器控件，以及容器控件。A master page can contain direct markup and server controls, as well as container controls. 将位于外部的母版页中的每个元素产生的合并母版页和内容页面的所有页面上呈现控件。Every element that is placed in the master page outside of a control is rendered on all pages that result from merging the master page and content pages. 每个内容页与母版页相关的必须引用中的母版页`MasterPageFile`其指令的属性。Each content page that is related to the master page must reference the master page in a `MasterPageFile` attribute of its directive. 内容页只能包含`@ Page`指令和一个或多个控件。Content pages can contain only a `@ Page` directive and one or more controls. 所有页面的文本、 标记和服务器控件必须放置在控件。All of your page text, markup, and server controls must be placed within controls. 你确定主控形状的控制页与通过设置关联控件属性控件。You identify the control of a master page that a control is associated with by setting the property of the control. 在运行时，从每个动态内容与相关的确切位置中的母版页合并请求的页面中的控制控件。At run time, the dynamic content from each control in the requested page is merged with the master page in the exact location of the related control. 任何其他标记和母版页中的控件不会受到影响。Any other markup and controls in the master page are unaffected. 在这两个主类并在内容页上，可以定义事件处理程序。Event handlers can be defined in both the master class and on the content page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 母版页和内容页中的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b3ab2d01-9e37-4788-82d0-c6065e3ff5bd)。For more information, see [Events in ASP.NET Master and Content Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b3ab2d01-9e37-4788-82d0-c6065e3ff5bd). 类是与.master 扩展名的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have a .master extension. 这些文件在运行时作为编译对象，并在服务器内存中缓存。These files are compiled at run time as objects and are cached in server memory. 将提供给通过内容页面的母版页属性的基本类。The master page is made available to the content page through the property of the base class. 属性返回的母版页实例; 但是，它被类型化为基本类。The property returns the instance of the master page; however, it is typed as the base class. 访问控制、 属性和函数的主页上，为属性可以强制转换为对象。To access controls, properties, and functions of the master page, the property can be cast to a object. 使用定义的母版页的类名`ClassName`指令的特性。The class name of the master page is defined using the `ClassName` attribute of the directive. > [!NOTE] > .Master 扩展名的文件不是向浏览器。Files with .master extensions are not served to a browser. 在主页面都有效的指令将与上可用的相同对象。The directives that are valid on a master page are the same as those that are available on a object. 它们可以包括以下属性：They can include the following attributes: - `AutoEventWireup` - `ClassName` - `CodeFile` - `CompilerMode` - `CompilerOptions` - `Debug` - `Description` - `EnableTheming` - `EnableViewState` - `Explicit` - `Inherits` - `Language` - `LinePragmas` - `MasterPageFile` - `Src` - `Strict` - `WarningLevel` 主页面指令不重写各个内容页上的指令。Master page directives do not override the directives on individual content pages. 最常以声明方式创建主页面。Master pages are most often created declaratively. 如果你想要以编程方式创建主页面，直接从派生类。If you want to create a master page programmatically, derive directly from the class. 除扩展外类，您必须创建.master 文件来直观地显示用户界面 (UI) 与在源文件中调用的类相关联。In addition to extending the class, you must create the .master file to visually display the user interface (UI) that is associated with the classes that you have invoked in your source file. > [!NOTE] > 通过首先创建您自己的类创建主页面时，必须包括所有所需的页面使用的类的命名空间。When you create a master page by creating your own class first, you must include all namespaces that are required for the classes that are used by the page. 有关主页面的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 母版页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b)。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b). ## Examples 本部分包含四个代码示例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建主页面。The first code example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively. - 第二个代码示例表示与第一个代码示例中创建母版页相关联的内容页。The second code example represents the content page that is associated with the master page that was created in the first code example. - 第三个代码示例演示如何将属性添加到母版页。The third code example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. - 第四个代码示例演示如何使用内容页访问母版页的公共属性。The fourth code example demonstrates how to use a content page to access a public property on the master page. 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式创建主页面，以及如何使用内容页向它添加一些内容。The following example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively and to add some content to it using a content page. 第一个 Web 页是名为的.master 页面`MasterPageSample_1.master`。The first Web page is the .master page named `MasterPageSample_1.master`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下面的示例表示与关联的内容页`MasterPageSample_1.master`。The following example represents the content page that is associated with `MasterPageSample_1.master`. 它包含控制和标识与相关联的内容是通过使用控件属性。It contains a control and identifies the control that the content is associated with by using the property. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1cs.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1vb.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` 下面的示例演示如何将属性添加到主页面。The following example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. `ClassName`属性用于命名主页面。The `ClassName` attribute is used to name the master page. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下面的示例演示如何使用内容页访问的公共属性`SiteName`中前面的代码示例的主页面上。The following example shows how to use a content page to access the public property `SiteName` on the master page in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ```

summary.span: 将 控件添加到 字典。

span.span: Adds a control to the dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 母版页派生的类可以添加控件添加到字典使用方法。Derived master page classes can add controls to the dictionary using the method. 派生的类型通常不重写方法。Derived types do not typically override the method.

exception.span: 在 字典中已经存在具有相同名称的 控件。

span.span: A control with the same name already exists in the dictionary.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Friend ReadOnly Property ContentPlaceHolders As IList
protected public: property System::Collections::IList ^ ContentPlaceHolders { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取母版页用来定义不同内容区域的 控件的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of controls that the master page uses to define different content regions.

value.span: 控件的 ，母版页使用它作为内容页中的 控件的占位符。

span.span: An of controls that the master page uses as placeholders for controls found in content pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类访问母版页属性可以列出当前由主机包含的控件。Derived master page classes access the property to list the current controls that are contained by the master. 派生的类型通常不重写属性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Friend ReadOnly Property ContentTemplates As IDictionary
protected public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ ContentTemplates { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与母版页相关联的内容控件的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of content controls that are associated with the master page.

value.span: 与母版页相关联的内容控件的 。

span.span: An of content controls associated with the master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类访问母版页属性来检索当前控件，由关联的内容页面定义。Derived master page classes access the property to retrieve the current controls, as defined by associated content pages. 派生的类型通常不重写属性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

span.span: The control that represents the container of the content.

summary.span: 提供一个方法将当前模板控件设置为拥有母版页的页。

span.span: Provides a method to set the current template control to a page that owns the master page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Master As MasterPage
public: property System::Web::UI::MasterPage ^ Master { System::Web::UI::MasterPage ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取嵌套母版页方案中当前母版页的父级母版页。

span.span: Gets the parent master page of the current master in nested master pages scenarios.

value.span: 当前母版页的父级母版页；如果当前母版页没有父级，则为 。

span.span: The master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性是只读的因为不能在运行时构建母版页层次结构。The property is read-only, because master page hierarchies cannot be built at run time. ## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建嵌套的母版页`.`第二个代码示例演示如何引用第一个代码示例中创建的母版页。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用内容页引用第二个代码示例中创建的母版页。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建嵌套的母版页和表示名为的父级母版页`ParentMasterPage_1`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用嵌套的母版页上名为`ChildMasterPage_1`引用前面的代码示例中创建的母版页。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用一个名为的内容页`ContentPage`引用`ChildMasterPage_1`前面的代码示例中所创建。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MasterPageFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MasterPageFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含当前内容的母版页的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the master page that contains the current content.

value.span: 当前母版页的父级母版页的名称；如果当前母版页没有父级，则为 。

span.span: The name of the master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建嵌套的母版页`.`第二个代码示例演示如何引用第一个代码示例中创建的母版页。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用内容页引用第二个代码示例中创建的母版页。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建嵌套的母版页和表示名为的父级母版页`ParentMasterPage_1`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用嵌套的母版页上名为`ChildMasterPage_1`引用前面的代码示例中创建的母版页。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用一个名为的内容页`ContentPage`引用`ChildMasterPage_1`前面的代码示例中所创建。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

exception.span: 属性只能在 事件中或之前设置。

span.span: The property can only be set in or before the event.
